title: RAAC | Website
description: RAAC is a company founded in 2012 that provides consultancy and auditing services while maintaining a commitment to quality, reliability, and creativity. We custom made a Next.js website for this client.

title: Tracefy | Backoffice
description: Tracefy is a company providing a platform for fleet management and tracking. I made a Laravel backoffice for this client. This application is used by the company's employees to automate their processes.

title: Tracefy | Infrastructure Migration
description: Tracefy had a problem with their infrastructure. They had a lot of servers and they were not able to manage them. I helped them to migrate their infrastructure to AWS and I also helped them to manage their servers.

title: Tracefy | Infrastructure AS Code
description: Tracefy had a old that was managed by hand. I helped them to migrate their infrastructure to IAC. This helped them to manage their infrastructure in a better way. Also, this helped them to scale their infrastructure easily.

title: Tracefy | Socket Services
description: Tracefy had multiple socket service that were not dry and written in old PHP versions (5.6). I helped them to migrate their socket services to new PHP versions and also I helped them to make them dry. This helped them to scale their socket services easily.

title: Tracefy | Migration docker to kubernetes
description: Tracefy had a lot of docker containers that were not managed by kubernetes. I helped them to migrate their docker containers to kubernetes. This helped them to manage their containers in a better way. Before this, they were managing their containers by docker swarm.

title: Tracefy | Migration PHP 7.0 to PHP 8.2 and Laravel multiple versions
description: Tracefy had a few PHP services that were not updated to the latest PHP version. I helped them to migrate their PHP services to the latest PHP version. This helped them to use the latest PHP features. Also, I helped them to migrate their PHP services to the latest Laravel version. This helped them to use the latest Laravel features.

title: Tracefy | Dealershop
description: Tracefy had a old wordpress website build on sage theme. I co developed a new dealershop in Wordpress. This helped them to manage their dealerships in a better way.

title: Tracefy | Microservices
description: Tracefy had a few monolith applications I split them to be multiple microservices. This made them more scalable.

title: Tracefy | Monitoring business Metrics
description: Tracefy had a few monitoring rules. I firstly migrated their old monitoring to influxDB for business metrics

title: Tracefy | Monitoring infrastructure metrics
description: Tracefy had a few influx metrics to view mem and cpu usage. I migrated this to prometheus and grafana. This helped them to view their metrics in a better way. And have a good overview for their infrastructure monitoring.

title: Tracefy | Jasper api integration
description: Tracefy had a few operations that were done manually. I helped them to automate these operations by integrating their jasper api. This helped them to automate their operations and save time hours per week.

title: Elephant | Bambook e-commerce
description: When I was working at Elephant, I helped them to build a e-commerce website for Bambook. This was build in Magento 2. This helped them to sell their products online.

title: Elephant | the-bulldog e-commerce
description: When I was working at Elephant, I helped them to build a e-commerce website for the-bulldog. This was build in wordpress with woocommerce. This helped them to sell their products online.

title: Elephant | De franse alp e-commerce
description: When I was working at Elephant, I helped them to build a e-commerce website for De franse alp. This was build in wordpress with woocommerce.
